Description:
Add a new bookmark into a specific location within the bookmarks

Verify new folder creation and nesting of new folders.

Verify folder(s) are correctly deleted.

sort and reverse-sort per column

Verify that dragging an image across browser windows

Confirm that dragging a directory

Verify that you can save a form's data by right clicking on

Verify that you can save a form's data from the popup dialog
      box, never for this site and you are never asked again upon
      returning to the site.

Verify that when you encounter a Web site that could be prefilled
      and have several choices for fields that you are given the pre-fill
      dialog and can select from the appropriate values and the information
      is filled into the form.

Feature: Edit Form Data - new value for field
Description:
Verify that if you add a new value for a field in Form Manager
      it is later offered as an option when prefilling a form using
      this field.

Feature: Delete Form Data - remove field value
Description:
Verify that if you delete data in the Form Manager, that this
      data is not shown as an option when prefilling a form.

Verify that clicking non clickable regions in help causes no
